code: import{useState}from"react";import{addPortfolio}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AdminDashboard(){const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[category,setCategory]=useState("");const[description,setDescription]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const token=localStorage.getItem("token");await addPortfolio({title,category,description},token);alert("Portfolio item added");setTitle("");setCategory("");setDescription("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Category",value:category,onChange:e=>setCategory(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Portfolio"})]})]});}
